sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:415;] We found no WORK HISTORY section header for the candidate, but we calculated where we thought WORK HISTORY was located in the resume. The work history section should have a header such as 'Work History' before listing the content.
[Sovren:301;] Neither an email address nor a phone number were found in the contact information. A resume should always include both.

[Sovren:303;0,5] Each of the following sections in the resume contain more content than the work history and education sections combined: 'Key Skills', 'IT Skills'. This may indicate a problem with section headers, formatting, or content.
[Sovren:323;SKILLS] The following section type appeared multiple times in the resume: SKILLS (2 occurrences). Each section type should only appear once in a resume.
[Sovren:325;2] The following sections do not have a header: Section with index 2 (of type: WORK HISTORY). Every section should have a header directly above the content associated with it.
[Sovren:211;] An email address was not found in the contact information. A resume should always include an email address.
[Sovren:212;] A phone number was not found in the contact information. A resume should always include a phone number.
[Sovren:222;POS-1] No employer name was found for: POS-1. Every position in a resume should have an employer name.
[Sovren:232;DEG-2] The following educational degree is not associated with a school: DEG-2. Every degree in a resume should be associated with a school.

[Sovren:112;] The following sections were identified as a skills section type: 'Key Skills', 'IT Skills'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education.

[Sovren:151;0,4] The following sections do not have the header on a separate line: 'Key Skills', 'Qualifications/Certifications/Programs:'. Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.
